thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 95 of 625
thread.title: Alta Lemus

author: Alta Lemus
title: Alta Lemus
text: I am new, started doing my shopping, loved the variety and the look and the ease in choosing. I chose my 2 pants for $24 which was great. However, the website does not tell you that though you that if you want to buy other products which may show in red they have a lower price available, you are not able to take advantage of them because YOU CAN ONLY BUY 1 OFFER AT A TIME. This would have been helpful.
